title: The French explorers
creator_credit: Crawley Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Discusses French entry into the age of exploration. Tells of Cartier’s search for the Northwest Passage in 1534, and depicts Champlain’s 1603 expedition to the St. Lawrence River. Also shows the founding of Quebec and immigration of missionaries and traders.
